weekly_top_story.headline: Cyberattack Disrupts Major European Airports Over Several Days
weekly_top_story.summary: A sustained cyberattack targeting electronic check-in and baggage systems significantly disrupted operations at major European airports in Brussels, Berlin, and London, exposing vulnerabilities in critical infrastructure and prompting urgent measures to restore normal airport functions.

stories.headline: Canada Post Workers Return to Strike Amid Financial Restructuring
stories.summary: Canada Post workers resumed strike action as the corporation implements sweeping changes to ensure financial sustainability, raising concerns about potential disruptions to mail services for millions of Canadians.

stories.headline: Drones Disrupt Airports and Military Bases in Denmark and Norway
stories.summary: Governments in Europe investigate unauthorized drone incursions over airports and military facilities in Denmark and Norway, prompting security concerns and debates about NATO’s role in addressing aerial threats.
